content: knitted vest in drops flora and drops kid-silk sizes s - xxxl drops design pattern no fl-059 yarn group a + a or c **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops flora from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-150-150-150-200-200 g colour 08 brown and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 75-75-75-100-100-100 g colour 35 chocolate **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each yarn = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 5 mm length 60 cm or 80 cm for stocking stitch and pattern drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for rib drops cable needle for cables
